resources.string: Please enter a valid mobile number.

Allow Chartered Box DoNotMiss App to read your incoming SMS and automatically forward your SMS to your registered email. 

You can opt-out SMS permission anytime by simply denying the permission from App info settings. 

By clicking the 'I Agree' button, you agree to Chartered Box DoNotMiss App's above policy.

Chartered Box DoNotMiss App is a service that allows to forward your SMS to registered Email address.

Chartered Box DoNotMiss App also allows you to share your SMS via app to other apps.

You can contact the Chartered Box DoNotMiss team by clicking on Contact us button.

Please note that if app is running in background and battery optimization is enabled then Chartered Box DoNotMiss app will not be able to read/forward incoming SMS.

Please disable battery optimization by using below steps.
1) Go to Chartered Box DoNotMiss App Info Settings
2) Select Battery option
3) Turn off battery optimization
